item.title: Senior Engineers Spend Less Time Coding - Dev Leader Weekly 118
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss balancing time coding as a senior software engineer. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/12/06/senior-engineers-spend-less-time-coding-dev-leader-weekly-118

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2025-12-05
item.description: Check out this week from Dev Leader! Here's a list including articles and videos on software engineering, career development, and programming in C#! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/12/06/weekly-recap-20251205
